text: operating securely in the cloud is a key
expectation of today's businesses
customers trust the cloud to host
process and protect large amounts of
sensitive data the scalable cloud
architectures that enable this are made
up of increasingly intricate software
components and protocols given this
intricacy how does AWS ensure the
highest levels of security to protect
the customers we serve and exceed
regulatory demands how can you be
confident that your data is continuously
protected at the highest levels of
assurance with automated reasoning
technology automated reasoning secure
software at its core using advanced
mathematics and logic to prove that
systems are operating as intended and
the way that you expect them to ensuring
verified software now and in the future
so how does automated reasoning work
automated reasoning formalizes intended
protocol and code requirements by
translating them to precise mathematical
specifications then systems are checked
to ensure they align with the
mathematical specifications this
checking is done using a logic framework
called a proof if the AWS infrastructure
and the mathematical requirements don't
align formal reasoning tools will detect
that when attempting to find a proof
imagine you are constructing an office
building and trying to test out all the
ways it could be broken into if all
these tests don't fail initially you
will assume the building is secure but
how can you be sure you've covered all
the scenarios and that all pathways will
remain secure in the future if you use
the building's architectural blueprint
as your guide you can have much higher
certainty that you've covered all the
possible break-in paths this same
analogy applies to cloud architecture if
you are a credit card company with a
global database web servers application
servers and many other components
connected via a complex network on the
cloud
can you tell with pinpoint precision if
millions of pieces of customer data are
secured
confirming this manually by pouring over
each data path scenario and associated
controls could take human beings months
if not years but by using automated
reasoning to analyze the credit card
company's core cloud the analysis time
to verify all network pathways and data
permission levels can be reduced from
months to milliseconds this speed and
mathematical level of accuracy offered
by automated reasoning technology at AWS
is used by us internally as well as with
customers that have the most sensitive
workloads and has introduced entirely
new heightened levels of security
assurance for provable security in the
cloud learn how formal reasoning at AWS
can help you achieve provable security
for your most important data today
